All Classes

Class Description
Admin
Represents an admin
AdminPanel
This is used to represent what an admin account sees
AuthorizationException
If a user doesn't have authority
BadPasswordException
If the password isn't valid
CannotPurchaseException
Refers to everything about how purchase cannot happen
CannotTradeException
Refers to everything about how trading cannot happen
ControlPanel
This is used to show the different settings that an admin can configure
Database<T extends DatabaseItem>
This class is used to store a list of items with methods provided to update entries of that list.
DatabaseFilePaths
For paths to database files
DatabaseItem
Provides for a way to keep track of all items with each having a unique id
EntryNotFoundException
The entry was not found in the database
FrozenSettingsPanel
This panel represents the settings a frozen trader can interact with
HandleFrozenManager
Handles anything relating to freezing a user
HandleItemRequestsManager
For handling new TradableItem + purchasable items requests
InventoryComboBoxItem  
ItemQuery
For getting info about a specific item
ItemsPanel
Shows the list of items and list of wishlist items
LoginManager
Used for logging in and registering, as well as any setup like changing global settings
LoginPanel
This represents the login screen
Main
This is where the program starts running
Manager
This is used to help make accessing and modifying the database files to be easier, while giving the generic EntryNotFoundException more meaning.
MessageManager
Used for managing notifications and messages
MessagePanel
Represents messaging and receiving messaging part of the window
NotificationsPanel
Used for messages and any notifications
OverviewPanel
Shows the overview of what an admin can do such as freezing an account
Report
Represents what goes into reporting someone
ReportManager
Used for managing reports
Review
Represents giving something a review
SearchPanel
Represents the search panel
SearchPanelTraderDetails
Deals with displaying the search results
SettingsPanel
Represents the panel where the user can adjust the settings
TemporarySetup
This class is not used in production and is only used to have an example interface full of users
TestManager
This is used to help make accessing and modifying the database files to be easier, while giving the generic EntryNotFoundException more meaning.
TestTrade  
TestTradingInfo  
TradableItem
Represents an item that is supposed to be traded
TradableItemNotFoundException
When the tradable item entry is not found
Trade
Represents a trade between two users
TradeNotFoundException
The trade entry doesn't exist
TradePanel
Represents the panel where trading occurs
TradeQuery
For getting info about a specific trade
Trader
represents a trader (user who can trade)
TraderComboBoxItem  
TraderDetailsWindowAdapter
For showing JFrame of showing details of trader
TraderManager
Used for the actions of a Trader
TraderPanel
This is used to show what a trader account sees
TraderProperties
Represents properties that are stored in a file
TradingInfoManager
Handles anything about getting info on trading and on traders, but this does not handle trading itself
TradingManager
Used for trading
User
Represents a typical account
UserAlreadyExistsException
The user entry already exists
UserNotFoundException
The user entry doesn't exist
UserQuery
For getting info about a specific user
UserTypes
Represents different user account types
WindowManager
This is used to manage settings in the overall window itself
